remarks: A condition allowing swap of restricted "at most one" and restricted existential quantifiers, analogous to ~ 2moswap .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jun-2017.)
statement:
2rmoswap $p |- ( A. x e. A E* y e. B ph -> ( E* x e. A E. y e. B ph -> E* y e. B E. x e. A ph ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d x y $.
